newsitem.title: USA: Wang Labs CEO gets $8 mln bonus to stay - WSJ.
newsitem.headline: Wang Labs CEO gets $8 mln bonus to stay - WSJ.

text.p: Wang Laboratories Inc gave its chairman and chief executive officer Joseph Tucci an $8 million cash and stock bonus after he turned down an offer to join Novell Inc, the Wall Street Journal said in Monday's electronic edition.

Tucci encouraged the company to rewrite his contract and give him a $4 million retention bonus, the paper said, citing Wang officials. They also promised to give him 230,000 shares of restricted stock, the paper said.
